message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate it, but I'm hoping to get it for a bit less.  How about $105?  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see that you're willing to make a serious offer. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $107.50. What do you think?
